name: Northway Financial
tag_list: northway-financial-corporation, northway-financial, northway, northway-brokers, ndg, malta, northway-in-malta, europe-northway
overview:
Northway Financial Corporation Ltd. is a financial institution, duly licensed to provide money lending services under the Financial Institutions Act 1994. It is operating under direct supervision of the Malta Financial Servives Authority.

Since its inception in 2005, Northway Financial Corporation Ltd. is internationally active in the online money lending industry. Its customer base is located in Europe and North America and expected to increase into other continents as well.

Prime Minister and Parliamentary Secretary for Finance Visit Northway Financial

Prime Minister Lawrence Gonzi and Parliamentary Secretary for Finance Tonio Fenech visited the offices of Northway Financial Corporation Ltd in Sliema. Northway has been operating an office in Malta since 2005 and currently employs 130 people. Future plans include doubling the employee base. Being a financial institution licensed by the Malta Financial Services Authority, Northway is a financial services company and offers loans to its clients in the United States, the United Kingdom and Australia. http://www.northwaybroker.net/news.php?page=1

offices.address1: Level 8, Plaza Commercial Centre Bisazza Street
